title: Dark Quiet Death
description: Darkness will fall, but one warrior will not go quietly. Ash Light from the Dark Quiet Death video game franchise makes her big screen debut.
altHero: Ash light, a strong blonde woman
alt1: a monster with pulsing skin, yellow eyes, and sharp teeth
alt3: a woman in a motorcycle jacket and helmet holds up a silver flashlight
alt4: Ash Light covered in dirt and blood holds two guns out to her sides
